parameters.name: ActionName
parameters.description: The action name of the component.

parameters.name: AssetId
parameters.description:
The resource instance ID of the email sender.

>  You can call the [DescribeComponentAssets](~~DescribeComponentAssets~~) operation to query the ID.

parameters.name: ComponentName
parameters.description: The name of component in the playbook.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and the response. Valid value:

*   **zh** (default): Chinese.
*   **en**: English.

parameters.name: NodeName
parameters.description: The name of the node in the playbook.

parameters.name: PlaybookUuid
parameters.description:
The UUID of the playbook.

>  You can call the [DescribePlaybooks](~~DescribePlaybooks~~) operation to query the UUIDs of playbooks.

parameters.name: RoleFor
parameters.description: The ID of the user who switches from the current view to the destination view by using the management account.

parameters.name: RoleType
parameters.description:
The type of the view. Valid values:

*   0: the view of the current Alibaba Cloud account.
*   1: the view of all accounts for the enterprise.
